newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: New Zealander killed in Malaysia helicopter crash.
newsitem.headline: New Zealander killed in Malaysia helicopter crash.

text.p: A New Zealander was killed when a helicopter used to transport logs crashed in the remote interior of Malaysia's Borneo state of Sarawak, the national news agency Bernama reported on Monday.
Chris Podjursky, 42, co-pilot of the Russian-made helicopter, was pronounced dead at Kapit Hospital in Sarawak after the crash on Sunday, Bernama quoted hospital sources as saying.

The pilot, an unidentified Russian in his 30s, suffered head injuries and a fracture of the lower back spine. He was admitted to a hospital in the coastal town of Sibu, where he was reported to be in stable condition.
The cause of the crash had yet to be ascertained, Bernama said.
